title: How can we add ANY menu command to the Unified Toolbar?
content:
(It's a pity you don't have a ‚Äúusability‚Äù topic here, because that is by far the biggest obstacle for many people to use Thunderbird. That's why it's important to be aware of the problems. üòä)

Hello

Nowadays, emails are often formatted like Word documents to appeal to recipients as much as possible, because unfortunately, emails are considered "by nerds and for nerds" if they look like a text editor from 20 years ago ‚òπÔ∏è

Although ribbons are loved by 95% of users (this popular usability feature is almost 20 years old!), Thunderbird, unfortunately, still does not offer anything similarly simple.

Therefore, it would be very useful if users could place EVERY menu command in the unified toolbar üòç so that important functions do not have to be searched for somewhere in a sub-sub-sub menu, but can be accessed with a single click on the toolbar.

Therefore my question: How can we place any Menu Command onto the unified toolbar?

For example, we would like to have a drop-down list with all fonts in the toolbar, so that we can assign a font to selected text with just two clicks and, above all, so that we can filter the over 130 fonts in the drop-down list üòä

Thanks a lot, kind regards, Thomas
creator: Firefox.com80

title: Attachments not being received in Thunderbird when email sent to Gmail from iPhone

If I go directly into the Gmail account via Firefox the attachment is there. How can I get the attachment to come through from Gmail? I have no problems with similar emails coming from other correspondents.

title: conferma lettura/apertura email yahoo
content: Uso da anni ,oramai saranno forse 15 anni,Thunderbird (versione portabile) mai avuto problemi o meglio anni fa in fase di aggioranmento poi risolto mi pare su un forum o qu√≠ o su un altro sempre tipo lix o ...boh non ricordo comunuqe ho questo problema e mi seccherebbe scaricare usare e poi buttare un altro client ,ma mi seccherebbe veramente tanto usando principalemnte anzi solo Thunderbird Tra le varie mail,mannaggia il giorno che la feci,uso anche yahoo. Giorni fa ho mandato una email con documenti quindi direi importantissima,Tra le opzioni ho trovato le voci "Notifica ricevuta dello stato di conferma e Ricevuta di conferma.Trattandosi di unaemail importante le ho spuntate entrambe (so che se vogliono non mandano nulla o meglio solo una notifica la bloccano l¬¥altra me la manda il loro server ),ma....poi ho lettoo in rete che si funziona ma tutto dipende dalla email che si utilizza quindi in questo caso yahoo non supporta nulla. Ho trovato un altro cliente email che invece una sorta di notifica me la manda (sempre meglio di nulla per far capire entro un tot di tempo devo amnadre dei documneti.se io li mando e non hio avvisi/conferme non so se li hanno ricevuti .Se non li hanno ricevuti e/o "per errore" hanno eliminato l¬¥email risulta che non ho mai mandato nulla) DOMANDA. Esiste un puligin o un qualche sistema (a parte cambiare email e usare tipo (mi pare ci sia) google,un pug in ,un quacosa che "faccia chiedere al mio client,in questo caso Thunderbird,al clinte di chi riceve la posta una conferma/ricevuta ricezione? Il mio Thunderbird √© solo portabile ma √© aggiornato quindi quando ci sono aggiornamenti si aggiorna da solo Grazie Helena

title: More lines in title of appointments
content:
Hi, I found an entry in the "thunderbirdmail.de" forum from 2005, where they discuss the option of using userChrome.css for changing the number of lines in the title of an calender appointment.

My problem is, that if the text of the title is really long, thunderbird will not enlarge the title window (more lines), so I can see the whole text (as in Outlook - from where I just changed to Thunderbird a few weeks ago).

The entry into the userCrome.css (as suggested in the forum)

.calendar-color-box .event-name-label { 

   white-space:  break-spaces !important;

}

is not working (even I changed the "toolkit.legacyUserProfileCustomizations.stylesheets" to "true").

Can you help me with that issue?

Best reagrds

Gerd

title: Account instellen op nieuwe pc
content: Ik moest recent een nieuwe computer in gebruik nemen omdat de vorige helaas na 7 jaar ermee ophield . Firefox geinstalleerd en beginnen gebruiken zonder probleem , maar Thunderbird vroeg om mijn account in te stellen : gebruikersnaam , emailadres , wachtwoord . Ik kreeg dan een melding : " configuratie gevonden door algemene servernamen te proberen . " Waarna ik kon kiezen uit IMAP of POP3 , ik heb beide geprobeerd , met hetzelfde resultaat . Ik kreeg in beide gevallen de melding : " aanmelden bij server is niet mogelijk . waarschijnlijk een onjuiste configuratie , gebruikersnaam of wachtwoord . " Ik heb geen idee wat er mis is , ik gebruik zowel Firefox als Thunderbird al bijna 20 jaar zonder problemen . Ik zou dus graag nu Thunderbird als standaard email programma willen kunnen blijven gebruiken op mijn nieuwe PC .
